content: Shout out to @otftotowa for sliding me into the next class after my 5 minute commute turned to 35 behind an accident and I missed my 8AM. I have a monthly 4-class pack that gives me no excuses to miss when I sign up. I work out all over, in NYC, Fort Lee, Clifton... but the good catch here is once u book on the app, u have to stick w that class within 8 hours of when it's scheduled. The HIIT &rower gives me variety. Even when I'm sore and tired, it forces me to go!! One of my CBS Directors, Mark Grant got me into OTF last summer. To my CBS Sports colleges .... I'm sure he tried to hook u too üòÇü§£
name: Tina Cervasio

content: When your 2 passions, #Sports & #Arts blend together in 1 day! Heading from @siriusxmnbaradio to rehearsals for tonight's @sasfny 8th Annual Spring Arts Showcase. Hosting for my 3rd straight year & could not be more honored & proud of these #NYC #PublicSchool students. Flip through pics of last year's show & rehearsals this year. Nearly 28,000 students served yearly in 200 schools in curriculum based after school programs with skill development & more in education, sports & arts giving NYC kids opportunities they otherwise would not be able to afford.
name: Tina Cervasio

content: Still thinking about the talent, beauty & hard work by #NYC #publicschool #students in @sasfny Spring #Arts Showcase last night. Will be posting pics of performers soon!! So proud üëèüèº! üì∏ @benkophoto
name: Tina Cervasio

content: Scroll through the (10 üòÜ) photos to see the incredible talent cultivated through @sasfny after school programs in #NYC #publicschools at 8th Annual Spring Arts Showcase. Also want to shout out to @rodrickcovington -- so grateful he took time out of his crazy schedule of rehearsals, training sessions & running @corerhythmfitness to appear as a guest on stage and talk about his experience in the performing arts & what it takes to "make it on #Broadway" ... the man was preaching to these kinds! #amazing ....... all photos by üì∏ @benkophoto
name: Tina Cervasio

content: Thank you WISPER for Women Organization for honoring Speaker Sheila Oliver & me with the Inaugural Women of the Year Award. Thank you @joannec51 for your beautiful introduction. Thank you @nuebyshani for your sponsorship & support. To my heroine @christinalucia1 -- thank you for always inspiring me & encouraging me. And to my parents and husband ... I am nothing without you & there is now way to thank you Enoch for always being at my side. #dreamsareimportant #keepdreaming #thejourneyisneverover #giveback #womenempowerment
name: Tina Cervasio

content: Loved talking about empowering women, standing your ground, initiatives for young women, dresses (my #ootd #nuebyshani) photo filers (I used #Valencia here) & lighting with this brilliant mom, attorney, former Mayor, judge & mentor @joannec51 ! #nutley
name: Tina Cervasio

content: #nbadraft @siriusxmnbaradio made it to Brooklyn. @termineradio & @jumpshot8 will broadcast #NBA Today 5-7 from McMahon's & then have a viewing party. @bgeltz & I will be at Barclays interviewing all the picks! content: Not the #RBNY result we were hoping for, but it was a blast watching game w my #parents. My teacher mom was obsessed with the fact 18-year-old Tyler Adams was missing his HS graduation & after explain set pieces to her, when NYCFC had a set piece into the South Ward goal, she yelled "this is dangerous". My dad had a great time meeting the entire @newyorkredbulls front office & when Steve Cangialosi arrived my dad was totally ‚≠êÔ∏èstuck saying, "I love hearing his voice in person!" üòÇü§î #RBNY
name: Tina Cervasio

content: This was 24 hours ago after being on the job 20 hours (with a 2 hour nap on a couch & shower in between). I actually love days like this, anchoring, writing, interviewing guests, setting up more shoots, swimming in sports stuff, but was feeling loopy in the makeup room here. Grateful for @jsgonzalezz makeup magic all AM. Back to present day, I just watched the #NBAAwards & #Big3 broadcasts on DVR after crashing hard. I feel like I'm in a time warp today. üòÇüôÉ #tapforcredits
